description: Returns a concise representation of savings estimates for resources. Also returns de-duped savings across different types of recommendations.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Describes a filter that returns a more specific list of recommendations. Filters recommendations by different dimensions. restartNeeded (boolean) --- Whether or not implementing the recommendation requires a restart. rollbackPossible (boolean) --- Whether or not implementing the recommendation can be rolled back. implementationEfforts (list) --- The effort required to implement the recommendation. (string) --- accountIds (list) --- The account to which the recommendation applies. (string) --- regions (list) --- The Amazon Web Services Region of the resource. (string) --- resourceTypes (list) --- The resource type of the recommendation. (string) --- actionTypes (list) --- The type of action you can take by adopting the recommendation. (string) --- tags (list) --- A list of tags assigned to the recommendation. (dict) --- The tag structure that contains a tag key and value. key (string) --- The key that's associated with the tag. value (string) --- The value that's associated with the tag. resourceIds (list) --- The resource ID of the recommendation. (string) --- resourceArns (list) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the recommendation. (string) --- recommendationIds (list) --- The IDs for the recommendations. (string) ---

nested_params.name: restartNeeded
nested_params.description: Whether or not implementing the recommendation requires a restart.

nested_params.name: rollbackPossible
nested_params.description: Whether or not implementing the recommendation can be rolled back.

nested_params.name: implementationEfforts
nested_params.description: The effort required to implement the recommendation.

nested_params.name: accountIds
nested_params.description: The account to which the recommendation applies.

nested_params.name: regions
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the resource.

nested_params.name: resourceTypes
nested_params.description: The resource type of the recommendation.

nested_params.name: actionTypes
nested_params.description: The type of action you can take by adopting the recommendation.

nested_params.name: tags
nested_params.description: A list of tags assigned to the recommendation.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key that's associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value that's associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: resourceIds
nested_params.description: The resource ID of the recommendation.

nested_params.name: resourceArns
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the recommendation.

parameters.name: groupBy
parameters.description: The grouping of recommendations by a dimension.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: Additional metrics to be returned for the request. The only valid value is savingsPercentage. (string) ---

nested_items.name: estimatedTotalDedupedSavings
nested_items.description: The total overall savings for the aggregated view.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: A list of all savings recommendations.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: The estimated total savings resulting from modifications, on a monthly basis.

nested_items.name: recommendationCount
nested_items.description: The total number of instance recommendations.

nested_items.name: groupBy
nested_items.description: The dimension used to group the recommendations by.

nested_items.name: currencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code used for the recommendation.

nested_items.name: savingsPercentage
nested_items.description: The savings percentage based on your Amazon Web Services spend over the past 30 days.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results.
